title: Alan Dershowitz puts Noam Chomsky in his place with mind-boggling facts
description: I used a couple of different clips to put this together. Dershowitz mentions his suggestion to put the Israeli separation barrier on wheels. I added what Chomsky probably looked like when he said that. And he uses the very scholarly argument that "Bill Clinton personally told me" - so I had a little fun with that. It's silly, I know.
tags: Manufacturing Consent: Noam Chomsky And The Media (Film)
